$Padres pitcher Ed Whitson failed in his attempt to hit Pascual Perez in retaliation for Alan Wiggins HBP in the first; both teams warned

ej,white001,P,ripps901,Throwing at Batter ej,willd104,M,ripps901,Automatic ejection after warning $Pitcher Whitson and Padres manager Williams ejected by HP umpire Rippley for throwing three pitches at Perez after warning
ej,bookg001,P,ripps901,Throwing at Batter ej,virgo101,C,ripps901,Automatic ejection after warning $Pitcher Booker and Padres acting manager Virgil ejected by HP umpire Rippley for throwing at Perez

ej,leffc001,P,ripps901,Intentional HBP ej,krolj801,C,ripps901,Automatic ejection after warning ej,bedrs001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,mahlr001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,perrg001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,browb001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,summc001,P,ripps901,Fighting $Pitcher Lefferts and Padres acting manager Krol ejected by HP umpire Rippley after Perez was finally hit; both benches cleared and a 10-minute brawl ensued; Perez went to the Braves bench during the brawl but Padres Summers went after him there; Braves Horner blocked Summers from getting to Perez and the two fought; Braves Mahler, Bedrosian, and Perry plus Padres Summers and Brown ejected as a result of the brawl; Horner not ejected

ej,moord001,P,ripps901,Intentional HBP ej,torrj101,M,ripps901,Automatic ejection after warning ej,bevak001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,flant001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,gossr001,P,ripps901,Fighting ej,nettg001,P,ripps901,Charging mound after HBP $Braves Moore and manager Torre ejected by HP umpire Rippley; Padres Nettles ejected after he charged the mound and another brawl ensued; Nettles, Padres Flannery and Gossage ejected by Rippley; Padres Bevacqua was hit in head by a fan with a mug of beer and jumped on the dugout to chase the fan, but guards intervened; Bevacqua was also ejected by Rippley; crew chief McSherry ordered both benches cleared, sending the remaining players to their clubhouses; they were still available to play; when fans jumped on the field to join the fights, he considered forfeiting the game; five fans were arrested

$In the following week, Padres manager Williams was suspended for 10 games and find $10,000; manager Torre of the Braves was suspended for 3 games and find $1,000; several players were suspended and/or fined
